channel.title: [PI] Transparent error

item.title: [PI] Transparent error
item.dc:creator: @DarkLord1337 DarkLord1337
item.description:
@DarkLord1337 wrote:

with the transparent method i get this error:

client.java:95: error: cannot find symbol DrawingArea.transparentBox(334, 0, 0, 5320850, 512, 0, 97); ^ symbol: method transparentBox(int,int,int,int,int,int,int) location: class DrawingArea client.java:148: error: cannot find symbol if(k < topX) ^ symbol: variable topX location: class client client.java:150: error: cannot find symbol i1 -= topX - k; ^ symbol: variable topX location: class client client.java:151: error: cannot find symbol k = topX; ^ symbol: variable topX location: class client client.java:153: error: cannot find symbol if(j < topY) ^ symbol: variable topY location: class client client.java:155: error: cannot find symbol i -= topY - j; ^ symbol: variable topY location: class client client.java:156: error: cannot find symbol j = topY; ^ symbol: variable topY location: class client client.java:158: error: cannot find symbol if(k + i1 > bottomX) ^ symbol: variable bottomX location: class client client.java:159: error: cannot find symbol i1 = bottomX - k; ^ symbol: variable bottomX location: class client client.java:160: error: cannot find symbol if(j + i > bottomY) ^ symbol: variable bottomY location: class client client.java:161: error: cannot find symbol i = bottomY - j; ^ symbol: variable bottomY location: class client client.java:162: error: width is not public in Component; cannot be accessed fro m outside package int k1 = width - i1; ^ client.java:163: error: width is not public in Component; cannot be accessed fro m outside package int l1 = k + j * width; ^ client.java:165: error: cannot find symbol anInt1387 = -374; ^ symbol: variable anInt1387 location: class client client.java:169: error: cannot find symbol int i3 = pixels[l1]; ^ symbol: variable pixels location: class client client.java:170: error: cannot find symbol pixels[l1++] = ((l & 0xff00ff) * opac + (i3 & 0xff00ff) * j3 & 0 xff00ff00) + ((l & 0xff00) * opac + (i3 & 0xff00) * j3 & 0xff0000) >> 8; ^ symbol: variable pixels location: class client Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 16 errors Press any key to continue . . .

the transparent method code i used:

[code]public static void transparentBox(int i, int j, int k, int l, int i1, int j1, int opac)
{
int j3 = 256 - opac;
if(k < topX)
{
i1 -= topX - k;
k = topX;
}
if(j < topY)
{
i -= topY - j;
j = topY;
}
if(k + i1 > bottomX)
i1 = bottomX - k;
if(j + i > bottomY)
i = bottomY - j;
int k1 = width - i1;
int l1 = k + j * width;
if(j1 != 0)
anInt1387 = -374;
for(int i2 = -i; i2 < 0; i2++)
{
for(int j2 = -i1; j2 < 0; j2++){
int i3 = pixels[l1];
pixels[l1++] = ((l & 0xff00ff) * opac + (i3 & 0xff00ff) * j3 & 0xff00ff00) + ((l & 0xff00) * opac + (i3 & 0xff00) * j3 & 0xff0000) >> 8;
}
l1 += k1;
}

}[/code]
